name: Stronger Together (Soskar)
description:
This game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Simple puzzle game with 10 levels, where you need to correctly use the abilities of two characters: the cube and the cursor.

Cursor can move the cube, use levers and destroy some obstacles

Cube can use buttons

Controls:

R — restart level

Left mouse button — move the cube

Right mouse button — attack

Esc — Pause
